snippet.title: RoboSquad Revolution Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
IT’S TIME FOR AN ANNOUNCEMENT 🤯

We’ve officially rebranded our project! 🥳

No longer will this game be known as Zorans Resistance, instead that will be our studio name. Moving forward this game is known as Robosquad Revolution!!! 🤖

Why this name? 🤷‍♂️
The essence of 'RoboSquad Revolution' is to give our players a clear image: a frenetic 3rd-person action arena where you team up with friends to conquer objectives. From zany holograms to mind-blowing killstreaks, our game's signature is delivering rapid, hilariously intense action. We aim for instant recognition just by the name! 🤖🏆✨

Join up with friends as you battle to help Zorans achieve freedom in the most face paced action arena shooter around. 🔥

#gamers #gamingfun #indiegame #gamers #gamingfun #freegames #freetoplay
